title: Interview with Jos Buivenga (Exlijbris)
content:
See the nice interview with Jos Buivenga at [I love typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224084900/http:/ilovetypography.com/2008/04/16/face-to-face-an-interview-with-jos-buivenga/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224084900im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6_sketch_2_4132.png)

_image from i love typography_
author: Renko

comments.content: Fabulous! Fontin and Museo are becoming two of my favorites, so it’s great to finally learn some more about Jos, and to see his sketchbooks!

I find it a great honor to have been asked for this interview.  
Thanks Rainer for spotting this and thanks James for your kind comment!
